sense.def:
To refuse to do something
pomeni, da nečesa namerno ne storimo ali da odločno rečemo, da nečesa ne bomo naredili.

seg.quote: He refused to accept this advice.
Their bosses refuse to allow them any responsibility.

sense.def:
To refuse someone something
pomeni, da nekomu ne dovolimo, da bi tisto imel.

seg.quote: Only the president could refuse him a loan.
The Council refused permission for them to live together.

sense.def:
To refuse
pomeni ne sprejeti tistega, kar nam je nekdo ponudil.

seg.quote: I offered him wine but he refused it.

sense.def:
Refuse
so odpadki in nepotrebne stvari v hiši, trgovini ali tovarni, ki jih redno mečemo stran;
